Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions.NEWEST_SUPPORTED_PROTOCOL_VERSION
    This is provided for backward compatibility; use ProtocolVersion.NEWEST_SUPPORTED instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer,ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions.getProtocolVersion()
    This is provided for backward compatibility, use ProtocolOptions.getProtocolVersionEnum() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.RegularStatement.getValues()
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use RegularStatement.getValues(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.RegularStatement.getValues(int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use RegularStatement.getValues(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serialize(Object)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.serialize(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serialize(Object, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.serialize(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serializeValue(Object)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.serializeValue(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serializeValue(Object, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.serializeValue(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster.Builder.withProtocolVersion(int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use Cluster.Builder.withProtocolVersion(ProtocolVersion) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.AbstractGettableData(int)
    This constructor is provided for backward compatibility, use AbstractGettableData.AbstractGettableData(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions(int, int, SSLOptions, AuthProvider)
    This is provided for backward compatibility; use #ProtocolOptions(int, ProtocolVersion, int, SSLOptions, AuthProvider)) instead.
